schema.prompt:
Adapt content for specific platform requirements:

Core Content: {{input.coreContent}}
Key Points: {{input.keyPoints}}
Format Specifications: {{input.formatSpecs}}
Original Structure: {{input.originalStructure}}
Target Platforms: {{input.targetPlatforms}}

Create platform-optimized content:

1. Social Media Posts:
   - Twitter/X (280 chars)
   - LinkedIn (professional tone)
   - Instagram (visual-first)
   - Facebook (community-focused)
   - TikTok (trend-aware)

2. Email Content:
   - Subject lines (compelling)
   - Newsletter blurbs (scannable)
   - Email sequences (nurturing)
   - Call-to-action buttons
   - Mobile-optimized format

3. Blog Summaries:
   - Executive summaries
   - Key takeaway bullets
   - Quote highlights
   - Related post teasers
   - SEO-friendly snippets

4. Presentation Content:
   - Slide headlines
   - Bullet point content
   - Speaker notes
   - Visual descriptions
   - Transition phrases

5. Video/Podcast Adaptations:
   - Script outlines
   - Key talking points
   - Hook openings
   - Segment breakdowns
   - Call-to-action endings

6. Platform-Specific Features:
   - Hashtag optimization
   - Mention strategies
   - Visual content descriptions
   - Interactive elements
   - Platform algorithms

7. Audience Considerations:
   - Platform demographics
   - Consumption patterns
   - Engagement preferences
   - Content expectations
   - Optimal posting times

8. Format Constraints:
   - Character limits
   - Image requirements
   - Video lengths
   - Audio considerations
   - Mobile optimization

Return as structured JSON with keys: socialMediaPosts (object by platform), emailBlurbs (array with types), blogSummaries (array), presentationSlides (array with slide content), videoAdaptations (object), platformFeatures (object by platform), audienceNotes (object), formatConstraints (object).
